amendment.description: Amendment requires the head of each Federal agency to electronically submit a report to the Congressional Budget Office on each settlement agreement entered into pursuant to this bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 114-724 to require the head of each Federal agency to electronically submit a report to the Congressional Budget Office on each settlement agreement entered into pursuant to this bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price, Tom amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Price, Tom.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Price, Tom amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
